mapper.select: select * from users where user_id = #{user_id} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, password, tel, email, interest, dislike, description) values (#{user_id}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{interest}, #{dislike}, #{description})
mapper.update: update users set password = #{password}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, interest = #{interest}, dislike = #{dislike}, description = #{description} where user_id = #{user_id}
